message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: LinkedHashMap<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<String, String>();
Iterator enu = object.keys();
while(enu.hasNext()) {
    String key = (String) enu.next();
    map.put(key, object.getString(key));
}
ArrayList<String> locationList = new ArrayList<String>(map.values());
<<<explanation>>>: JSON objects are unordered collections of key-value pairs. If you need to maintain the order of insertion, you should use a LinkedHashMap instead of a JSONObject. LinkedHashMap maintains the insertion order.
